html:
{% macro render_invoice(invoice_type) %}
{{ letter_head }}
Tax Invoice
Attn: {{ doc.contact_person }}
Customer Address
Invoice No. {{ doc.name }}
Date: {{ doc.get_formatted("posting_date")}}
{{ doc.customer }}
{{frappe.db.get_value("Address", doc.customer_address, "address_line1") or ''}} {{frappe.db.get_value("Address", doc.customer_address, "address_line2") or ''}}
{{frappe.db.get_value("Address", doc.customer_address, "city") or ''}} {{frappe.db.get_value("Address", doc.customer_address, "state") or ''}} - {{frappe.db.get_value("Address", doc.customer_address, "pincode") or ''}}
TRN NO : {{ frappe.db.get_value("Customer", doc.customer_name, "tax_id") or ''}}
Customer P.O. No : {{ doc.po_no }}
Delivery No : {{ '' }}
Job/Sales Order No : {{ doc.sales_order or doc.old_job_no or '' }}
Job Description
{{ doc.job_description or ' ' }}
{%- for row in doc.items -%} {% set this_item=frappe.get_doc("Item", row.item_code)%} {%- endfor -%} {%- for tax in doc.taxes -%} {%- endfor -%}
Sr Item Description UOM Qty/No Rate Amount
{{ row.idx }} {{ row.description[:25] }} {{row.uom}} {{row.qty}} {{row.rate}} {{row.amount}}
Total {{ doc.get_formatted("net_total", doc)}}

Discount {{ doc.get_formatted("discount", doc) or 0}}
{{tax.description}} {{'%0.2f' % tax.tax_amount}}
Grand Total {{ doc.get_formatted("grand_total", doc)}}
In Words: {{ doc.in_words }}

Bank Details
Account Name: Rhea Lauren Furnishing
Account Number: 1014102420101
IBAN : AE 610260001014102420101
Bank Name: Emirates NBD
Bank Address: KARAMA SHOPPING CENTRE, KARAMA, DUBAI
Swift Code: EBILAEAD
{{ doc.terms }}

{% endmacro %} {{ render_invoice("challan_cum_tax_invoice") }}
name: Rhea SI

html:
{% macro render_invoice(invoice_type) %}
{{ letter_head }}
Purchase Order
Supplier Address
Invoice No. {{ doc.name }}
Date: {{ doc.get_formatted("transaction_date")}}
{{ doc.supplier }}
{{frappe.db.get_value("Address", doc.supplier_address, "address_line1") or ''}} {{frappe.db.get_value("Address", doc.supplier_address, "address_line2") or ''}}
{{frappe.db.get_value("Address", doc.supplier_address, "city") or ''}} {{frappe.db.get_value("Address", doc.supplier_address, "state") or ''}} - {{frappe.db.get_value("Address", doc.supplier_address, "pincode") or ''}}
TRN NO : {{ frappe.db.get_value("Supplier", doc.supplier_name, "tax_id") or ''}}
Quote Ref : {{ doc.po_no or '' }}
Job/Sales Order No : {{ doc.sales_order or doc.old_job_no or ''}}
Delivery Terms : {{ ''}}
Payment Terms: {{ ''}}
Attn: {{ doc.contact_person }}
{%- for row in doc.items -%} {% set this_item=frappe.get_doc("Item", row.item_code)%} {%- endfor -%} {%- for tax in doc.taxes -%} {%- endfor -%}
Sr Item Description UOM Qty/No Rate Amount
{{ row.idx }} {{ row.description[:25] }} {{row.uom}} {{row.qty}} {{row.rate}} {{row.amount}}
Total {{ doc.get_formatted("net_total", doc)}}

Discount {{ doc.get_formatted("discount", doc) or 0}}
{{tax.description}} {{'%0.2f' % tax.tax_amount}}
Grand Total {{ doc.get_formatted("grand_total", doc)}}
In Words: {{ doc.in_words }}
{{ doc.terms }}

{% endmacro %} {{ render_invoice("challan_cum_tax_invoice") }}
name: Rhea PO
